column16: aunt and great aunt of many nieces and nephews. a past player of the riverside county softball team in providence
column17: rhode island. an associate member for many years of the all american girls professional baseball league. a memorial service will be held at a later date in grove oklahoma. arrangements by steuerle funeral home for info 630-832-4161 print back express your condolences contact us get mobile version privacy terms of use 2010 - 2015 steuerle funeral home ltd. funeral home website by batesville
